summary: THE MALFUNCTION INDICATOR LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER ON 5/24/2003, AND THE TEMPERATURE SENSOR WAS REPLACED.   SIX DAYS LATER LIGHT THE ILLUMINATED AGAIN.*AK THE VOLKSWAGEN HEADQUARTERS  DID PAY FOR THE HOSE WHEN THE MALFUNCTION INDICATOR LIGHT ILLUMINATED AT APPROX. 24,000 MILES.      *PH  *JB
